ValidationRule.description: Only the following profiles can mark oppties to be deleted: Core Sales Administration (DSA) Core Zone Administration (ZSA) MMS Sales ZSA (DSA and ZSA) HRS Sales Administration (DSA) HRS Regional Sales Admin (ZSA) NSS Core/HRS Profile (VirtSales)
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: (NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,"System Administrator")) && NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,"Core Sales Administration")) && NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,"Core Zone Administration")) && $Profile.Name <> "MMS Sales ZSA" && $Profile.Name <> "MMS Sales ZSA - SB" && $Profile.Name <> "MMS Sales DSA - SB" && $Profile.Name <> "HNBF Sales Administration" && NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name, "HRS Sales Administration")) && $Profile.Name <> "HRS Regional Sales Admin - SB" && $Profile.Name <> "2008-09 Operations Administration" && $Profile.Name <> "NSS Manager Admin" && $Profile.Name <> "Bank Channel Manager" ) && $Profile.Name <> "Sales Data Steward"&& $Profile.Name <> "Salesforce Support"&& ISCHANGED(To_Be_Deleted__c) && To_Be_Deleted__c
ValidationRule.errorMessage: **** Only DSAs, FSSs, RAs and ZAs can mark Opportunites to be deleted. ****
